heroSubtitle: MARHABA is your gateway to unforgettable experiences in the heart of the Sahara.
featuredOffersSubtitle: A curated selection of the best adventures waiting for you.
footerDescription: Your electronic portal to explore the treasures of the Algerian desert.
offersPageSubtitle: Find your perfect trip or accommodation in the Algerian desert.
noOffersFound: Sorry, no offers were found matching your search.
offerNotFoundMessage: The offer you are looking for might have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.
pleaseLogin: Please log in to view this page.
noOffers: You have not added any offers yet.
confirmDeleteOffer: Are you sure you want to delete this offer?
dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Register now
name: Name
checkOutAfterIn: Check-out date must be after check-in date.
dragDropOrClick: Drag & drop photos here, or click to browse
uploadImagesHelp: You can upload up to 5 photos. The first one will be the main image.
atLeastOneImage: At least one image is required.
priceMustBePositive: Price must be a positive number.
addAtLeastOneService: At least one service must be added.
vrSectionSubtitle: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Djanet before you even pack your bags.
vrOffersSubtitle: These organized trips will take you right into the heart of the landscapes you've just seen.
touristInfoSubtitle: Everything you need to plan your trip to Algeria.
evisaDescription: Citizens of many countries can now apply online for a tourist visa to visit the south of Algeria.
flightsDescription: Air Algérie offers regular flights to major airports in the Sahara, such as Djanet and Tamanrasset.
aboutPageP1: MARHABA is an innovative electronic platform that acts as an intermediary between tourists and tourism service providers in the vast and enchanting Algerian desert.
aboutPageP2: Our mission is to simplify the process of planning and exploring southern Algeria, focusing on smoothness and ease of use, and providing a dual experience that serves both the tourist and the service provider.
contactPageP1: If you have any questions or inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is ready to assist you.
privacyPageP1: We care about your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
termsPageP1: By using our platform, you agree to be bound by the following terms of use.
